Title: Life Rights
Writer: Darlene Hunt (creator), Hilly Hicks Jr., Dennis Kinski (staff writer)
Actors: Laura Linney, Oliver Platt, Gabriel Basso, John Benjamin Hickey
Plot: As he and Cathy (Laura Linney) prepare to adopt, Paul (Oliver Platt) entertains a big shot producer's (guest star Allison Janney) offer to turn his blog into movie. But when Cathy decides ...
